titleInfo.title: On the generality and comprehensiveness of the five factor model of personality: Evidence for five robust factors in questionnaire data

bibliographicCitation.dgps: Ostendorf, F. & Angleitner, A. (1992). On the generality and comprehensiveness of the five factor model of personality: Evidence for five robust factors in questionnaire data. In G.V. Caprara & G.L. van Heck (Hrsg.), Modern personality psychology (S. 73-109). New York [u.a.]: Harvester Wheatsheaf.
bibliographicCitation.angewandte-chemie: F. Ostendorf, and A. Angleitner, in Modern personality psychology (Eds.: G.V. Caprara, G.L. van Heck), Harvester Wheatsheaf, New York [u.a.], 1992, p. 73-109.
